gen:link.msg:message: `EquityDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatements` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `NegativeEquityParticipatingInterestsConsolidated` + `UnrealisedAccumulatedIntercompanyResult` - `ProvisionParticipatingInterestsDifferenceSeparateConsolidated` + `EquityDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsOther`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_EquityDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatements')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_EquityDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatements return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_NegativeEquityParticipatingInterestsConsolidated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_NegativeEquityParticipatingInterestsConsolidated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_UnrealisedAccumulatedIntercompanyResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_UnrealisedAccumulatedIntercompanyResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_ProvisionParticipatingInterestsDifferenceSeparateConsolidated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_ProvisionParticipatingInterestsDifferenceSeparateConsolidated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_EquityDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST104Variables1_EquityDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquitySeparateFinancialStatements` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_EquitySeparateFinancialStatements')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_EquitySeparateFinancialStatements return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquitySeparateFinancialStatementsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquitySeparateFinancialStatementsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquitySeparateFinancialStatementsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesEquityConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquitySeparateFinancialStatementsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
